item.description:
This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Loie Fuller's on the West Side/Armory District

Loie Fuller's is a charming, warm intimate restaurant beautifully decorated in the Art Nouveau style with murals, woodwork and a mosaic floor making you think you're in Paris instead of the West Side. Think The Avery on steroids. Its truely stunning and of course I spent a few minutes up close to the murals to examine the painting technique. They are known for their wine selection and I went here last summer during Restaurant Week and the food was great too! The parking lot is small, but there is also parking on the street. So if you've been wanting to go or haven't ever been, here's your chance! So let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.why: Its fun and we haven't been in awhile!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Loie Fuller's on the West Side!
